UnifiedMeetingParticipant.name: UnifiedMeetingParticipant
UnifiedMeetingParticipant.description: Represents a participant in a meeting.

ActivityId.description: ID of the meeting that the person is participating in.

ChannelAddress.description: The email address of the participant. The email address is captured at the time of the communication; it doesn’t change if the contact’s email address is updated later.

ParticipantType.description: The participant’s role in the meeting.

PersonId.description: ID of the contact, lead, or user participating in the meeting.
